ygData.subject: Re: New Bard...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m running into problems with weight now wearing bronze plate, though i hear rubicite is extremely light weight. Ka`Lend, 24th Wood Elven Bard on Rallos Zek
ygData.messageBody:
I'm running into problems with weight now wearing bronze plate, though i
hear rubicite is extremely light weight.

Ka`Lend, 24th Wood Elven Bard on Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:30 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 2 Jun 1999, Steve Fogle wrote:
>
> So is a Wood Elf the best race for a Bard? I have heard that strength is
> important for certain types of armor? Is this not that big of deal?

Wood elves can wear small armor, which weighs less than medium
armor. I think a full set of small plate requires
sixty-something strength, instead of the 80-something you need
for medium plate.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
